alert.note: Alert for Baker; Columbia; Hamilton; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued January 04 at 12:51PM EST until January 04 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 13 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 2 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST FLORIDA BAKER IN NORTHERN FLORIDA COLUMBIA HAMILTON SUWANNEE IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 12 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST GEORGIA APPLING ATKINSON BACON BRANTLEY CAMDEN CHARLTON CLINCH ECHOLS GLYNN PIERCE WARE WAYNE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALMA, ATKINSON, AXSON, BAXLEY, BELMONT, BLACKSHEAR, COLUMBIA, COUNTRY CLUB ESTATE, DOCK JUNCTION, DOCTORTOWN, DOVER BLUFF, DUNGENESS, FOLKSTON, GARDI, GLYNN HAVEN, HICKOX, HOBOKEN, HOMELAND, HOMERVILLE, HORTENSE, HOUSTON, JASPER, JEKYLL ISLAND, JENNINGS, JESUP, KINGSLAND, LAKE CITY, LIVE OAK, LULU, MACCLENNY, MCALPIN, NAHUNTA, NEEDHAM, NEEDMORE, NEW LACY, NEWBURN, OLENO STATE PARK, OLUSTEE, PEARSON, PINE GROVE, PLANT HATCH, RACE POND, RAYBON, SEA ISLAND, ST. GEORGE, ST. SIMONS, STATENVILLE, STEPHEN FOSTER STATE PARK, SUWANNEE SPRINGS, THALMANN, WATERTOWN, WAYCROSS, WAYNESVILLE, WEST LAKE, WHITE SPRINGS, WILLACOOCHEE, AND WINOKUR.
